mdRecord.dcterms:title: Barcarole (from the 4th concerto) / S.W. [sic] Bennett ; arranged for piano solo by Wm. Scharfenberg
Bennett, William Sterndale, 1816-1875. Concertos, piano, orchestra, F minor. no. 4, op. 19, F minor. arr. Barcarole; arr.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bennett, William Sterndale, 1816-1875
Scharfenberg, Wm. (William), 1819-1895
mdRecord.dcterms:description: For piano solo; originally for piano and orchestra.
Composer given on list title page as W. St. Bennett.
Advertisement on p. [8]: New music for piano solo.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Oeuvres choisies : a collection of favorite compositions for the piano forte ; no.185
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Concertos (Piano)--Excerpts--Piano scores.
Piano music, Arranged
